description.default: This is your project description. Provide a brief summary to help players understand the story and background of your project. Click on the text box to start.
description.label: Description

instructions.default: This is your project instruction. Provide a brief instruction to help players understand how to play your project. Click on the text box to start.
instructions.label: Instructions

rating.tip: This content may contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humor, blood, and other material not suitable for users under 13 years old.

report.desc: The reported content will be reviewed by the official or mod team, and if found to be true, the work will be rated or taken down.
report.label: Report

optional1.content: Pornographic or adult content; Violent, hateful, or discriminatory language; Harassment or threats towards others.
optional1.label: Inappropriate Content

optional2.content: Works that infringe upon someone else's intellectual property rights, such as unauthorized use of images, audio, videos, etc.
optional2.label: Copyright Infringement

optional3.content: Information in the work that is fabricated or misleading and may mislead other users.
optional3.label: False Information

optional4.content: Works used for promoting products, services, or linking to external websites.; Excessive repetitive content, such as spam messages.
optional4.label: Advertising or Spam

optional5.content: Works that disclose users' personal information or violate their privacy.; Works that maliciously disclose the personal information of others.
optional5.label: Privacy Violation

report.title: Report project

versions.changelogDefault: This is your change log. A brief change log can help players understand what new features have been updated in this version. Click on the text box to start.
versions.label: Versions
